content:
Anybody knows what this is: https://atomik.app | https://twitter.com/AtomikServer

It says RESTful and "standardized clilnical data" but it is vague on details. There's a company Cabolabs from Uruguay behind it it looks like

Anybody knows what this is: https://atomik.app | https://twitter.com/AtomikServer

It says RESTful and "standardized clilnical data" but it is vague on details. There's a company Cabolabs from Uruguay behind it it looks like

You can ask the author :)

Cabolabs uses mainly OpenEHR..

FYI: We use openEHR, HL7 v2.x, CDA, FHIR and DICOM. Also Mirth Connect, DCM4CHEE, HAPI, and EHRServer in the software area.
Not at all, is a product that has been developed over the last 6 years, now refactored and with new features added. If you don't know, you can ask.
@Pablo Pazos Gutierrez Why none of the links active on landing?
It states "well documented" and there is no link to "good documentation"?
The new product hasn't been launched, there are no links... this is a coming soon page.

Not sure what you mean, the product is already developed and is not an MVP, what I'm doing is a new launch, and what is on the page is about the new launch and what we'll have and offer, not current content. Really not sure what your point is. Again, if you don't know something, you can ask. I'm happy to clarify.
